summary: While Antonia (Toni) Leigh Chayes is not directly mentioned in the provided documents, her name appears as a variant. Concerns are raised regarding Abram Chayes' security clearances, potential associations, and perceived leniency towards communism. The documents also reference a House Select Committee on Assassinations request for material on Abram Chayes.
